comments:
To reproduce, choose File -> Open File ... and select a WSDL file that isn't in the workspace. A class cast exception occurs in org.eclipse.wst.wsdl.ui.internal.asd.ASDMultiPageEditor.buildAndSetModel().

The reason is that the file editor input is a JavaFileEditorInput and ASDMultiPageEditor.buildAndSetModel casts the input to IFileEditorInput.

Bug# 103491 seems to handle a similar issue but this issue appears in a different place and it appears in 1.5.

Complete stack trace:

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.ui.internal.editors.text.JavaFileEditorInput
